Apps.Description: An FPS RPG made in UE4
A recreation of Animal Crossing in UE4.

Updates.PostDesc:
With the initial progress of DystopiaGame coming along nicely, a pre-alpha is going to be released soon for download.

This pre-alpha is mainly for testing for bugs and fine tuning the features currently available. 
Periods between releases will be filled with progress reports and screenshots for new features for the next upcoming release.

We really hope you enjoy the pre-alpha as much as I have had fun making it. 
~ ZanyLeonic
